name: 蒼葉
message: "Uh!"
Quick as a snake, Clear grabs my hand.

name: クリア
message: "What's wrong, Master?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Oh, so you weren't asleep."

name: クリア
message: "No, I was. But I felt your presence."
I don't know what to think. Even if he was faking it, how could he react so fast?

name: クリア
message: "Master, do you want to see what's under my mask?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh? ...Well, I mean, I can't help wondering. But I'm not gonna force you."

name: クリア
message: "Oh no, it's fine. I'll show you if you like, Master."
Clear lets go of my hand, sits up, and reaches for his mask.
No way... He's really going to show me?
My heart starts pounding a bit.
Clear tugs at the mask with his fingers.

name: クリア
message: "Ta-da!"
Beneath his mask is...
...a fair skinned...
...slightly round...
...lady's face.
More accurately, a mask of a lady's face.
So... that's what Clear looks like...
AS-IF!
He had another mask under his gas mask?!
I was actually kinda looking forward to the reveal, but this takes me straight past disappointment into anger.

name: 蒼葉
message: "You little― Give me a fucking break!"
Ignoring my shout, Clear replaces his gas mask and falls back into the couch, assuming the exact same position as before.

name: クリア
message: "Zzzzzzz..."
...I can't believe this guy!
I consider kicking him off the couch, but decide it'll just be a waste of energy.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I should sleep too."
I go to my room and collapse on the bed.
This is not getting off to a good start.
Am I really going to be able to manage with that... thing?
Now I might even have yakuza after me...
I'm starting to feel like, even if I do find Toue, something's gonna come along to screw everything up.
I mean, really, that seems more likely than success at this point...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Fucking hard mode..."
I slowly close my eyes, surrendering to a darkness as black as my future.
